If you still have the trusty old 2.2.1, don't upgrade. 3.1.2. doesn't suck as badly as 3.1.3, but it does suck. The versions marked "stable" crash all the time, and this client eats up all my ram after running 30 mins, bogs down my comp until i have to force a shutdown. As i can't find a good 2.2.1 version, I'm moving to Vuze til they sort it out.
